name: partykit
description: PartyKit simplifies developing multiplayer applications. Everything's better with friends.
author: PartyKit, Inc. <team@partykit.io>

scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist dts *.d.ts *.d.ts.map && mkdir dts
scripts.dev:local: npm run clean && concurrently "dotenv -c development node -- -r esbuild-register --watch --watch-path src --watch-path facade scripts/build.ts" "tsc -p scripts/tsconfig.extract.json --watch" "node -r esbuild-register --watch --watch-path dts scripts/copy-dts.ts" --kill-others
scripts.dev:remote: npm run clean && concurrently "dotenv -c production node -- -r esbuild-register --watch --watch-path src --watch-path facade scripts/build.ts" "tsc -p scripts/tsconfig.extract.json --watch" "node -r esbuild-register --watch --watch-path dts scripts/copy-dts.ts" --kill-others
scripts.build: npm run clean && dotenv -c production node -- -r esbuild-register scripts/build.ts --production && tsc -p scripts/tsconfig.extract.json --incremental false && node -r esbuild-register scripts/copy-dts.ts
